User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemaps
Sitemap: https://soumen.vercel.app/sitemap.xml

# Block access to admin areas (if any)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/

# Allow all crawlers to access the main content
Allow: /
Allow: /project/
Allow: /#Home
Allow: /#About
Allow: /#Portofolio
Allow: /#Contact

# Crawl-delay (optional, helps with server load)
Crawl-delay: 1
